text:
.@US_FDA authorized @pfizer @BioNTech_Group #COVID19 #Vaccine, 1st to gain fed govt permission to go into use in U.S.

The authorization on Friday, following its record-setting swift development, sets stage for inoculations to begin within 1-2 days.
